view.message:
My name is Marc Rosner and I'm from St. Louis.

I'm a Junior, and would like to be a marketing analyst at the end of my program.

I play for the Mizzou Rocket League team.

I would really like to have a good understanding of creating primary data sources so that I'm less reliant on secondary sources for analysis. From what I've learned in classes like Marketing 4900, the best tool for a data analysis project is trustworthy, clean data.

Alex Estes from Columbia Missouri. 

I am a senior, I would like to work in market research. 

A fun fact is that I have an adorable cat named Myrtle. 

I would like to know how what is the most effective current method for gathering data, as a whole.

My name is Darby Roam and I'm from Lake of the Ozarks.

I'm a senior, and I would like to be a medical device sales representative. 

I have a mini Australian Shepherd named Maverick.

I would like to know more about the different data collection methods.

My name is David Scherrer, and I am from St. Louis Missouri

I am a senior and by the end of my program I would like to be in Marketing Sales

An interesting fact about me is that I am left-handed and an experience I just recently had was learning how to ski

By the end of this course, I would like to learn the different data collection methods for research and have the ability to understand and analyze the data

My name is Aly Edwards and I am from near Springfield, Missouri.

I am a junior and by the end of the program I would like to be a marketing analysist. 

My go to fun fact is that I can't smell.

By then end of this course I would like to know the best ways to collect data and the best ways to interpret it.

My name is Paige Beste and I am from St. Louis, Missouri.

I am a senior and I would like to work in market research after I graduate. 

My fun fact is I lived in Vienna, Austria for three months.

I would like to learn about the best techniques to use when gathering information about a target market, specifically international markets.

My name is Haedyn Kirkpatrick, and I am from St. Louis, Missouri.

I am a senior and I would like to work in a marketing role after I graduate. 

My fun fact is I studied abroad in Barcelona, Spain last spring.

By the end of the course, I would like to learn about different methods researchers use to find data.

My name is Megan Oduyoye and I am from Cincinnati, Ohio.

I am a senior and I would like to go to law school after I finish my undergrad.

My fun fact is I am on the Mizzou soccer team. 

I would like to learn more about the different types of data collection and how I can use that to enhance my research.

My name is Jordan Fleck, and I am from Kansas City Missouri

I am a senior and I am currently planning to move to Tampa Florida and begin my marketing career. 

Everyone in my family has a name that begins with J. 

I would like to increase my skills in marketing research so I can better improve my work.

My name is Phaelan Kennedy and I am from Northbrook, Illinois.

I am a Senior, majoring in Marketing. At the end of my program, I would like to land a career in the creative side of marketing. 

My favorite color is green, and I have enjoyed watching football with my friends lately!

I want to learn the best ways to apply marketing research to strategies that will execute progression in my career.

My name is Zoe Juma and I'm from St Louis, MO. 

I'm a senior and my goal is to become a marketing professional after I graduate. 

A fun fact about me is that I have an appreciation for tv and film. 

I want to learn more about marketing research so I can successfully support my ideas with data.

Hey my name is Emma Steedly, I’m from Louisville Kentucky.
I am a senior, this is my last semester of college! I am looking for a career in Marketing in Indianapolis for after I graduate. My favorite color is sunset orange. A cool fact about me is Jack Harlow went to my rival high school. 

A question I would love to answer during this semester is where am I working when this semester is over!

My name is Marie, I am from St. Louis but I've lived in Columbia for the majority of my life. 

My quest is senior, this is my final semester! I would like to be a marketing consultant or go into data analytics.

I don't have a favorite color. An interesting experience I've had is that I have transferred 2 times. 

I'd like to be able to conduct and identify reliable marketing research studies by the end of this course.

My name is Grayson Sosnoff and I am from Saint Louis, Missouri.

I am a senior and I would like to find myself in sports marketing.

I love to play golf and video games with my friends

By the end of this class I hope to be able to identify and select the best method to conduct marketing research.

Hi, my name is Jack Stebbins and I’m from Kansas City, MO.

I’m a junior studying marketing as well as music entrepreneurship. My goal is work in the music industry after graduation. 

My favorite color has gotta be orange. 

Interesting fact? I live in a retirement community w my parents over breaks. 

I want to be able to throughly conduct market research as effectively as possible instead of muddling my way thru like I do now.

My name is Ashley Massud and I’m from St. Louis, Missouri. I’m a senior at Mizzou studying International Business with an emphasis in Marketing. After I graduate in August, I’d like to go into sales, real estate, or marketing. My favorite color is blue and I would like to learn what exactly you do in marketing research.

My name is Grant Williamson and I am from Kansas City.

I am a senior and I would like to go into sales management after graduation.

An interesting fact about me is I love riding Harley-Davidson motorcycles.

My question is what are the main points of marketing research and what is it mainly used for.

My name is Grace Andrews and I'm from north Kansas City. 

I'm a junior and after I graduate I hope to do marketing work for a nonprofit organization.

An interesting fact about me is that I love to travel and just went to London over winter break!

At the end of this course, I would like to know more about the different methods of marketing research and when each would be most effective for different projects or companies.

My name is Carter Kussman and I'm from Lake Saint Louis, MO.

I am a junior marketing student looking to go into sales!

A fun fact is I play guitar.

By the end of this course, I would like to learn the best strategies to gather data more efficiently and how to use that data to solve problems.

• My name is Ben Lodes and I am from St. Louis
  • I am a senior this year and at the end of this year I am not exactly sure what I really want to do other than that I want to be in a sales role. 
  • My interesting fact is that I have 4 other siblings in my family. 
  • Something that I would like answered is what are some of the best methods to get good research done.

My name is Amanda Svetina but I go by Mandy. I am from St. Charles, MO.

I am a senior and would like to be a sales agent at the end of my program.

My number one vacation spot is the beach. I love warm weather!

I am looking forward to learning how to interpret and gather data that is the most precise.

My name is Isabella Gledhill and I'm from St. Louis 

I'm a senior and I would like to work in sports marketing

I am a gymnastics coach 

By the end of this course, I would like to have a basic understanding of different tools to obtain data.

Tyler Potthoff from St. Louis/Tampa.

I am a Senior and will be going into Sales/Marketing for E. & J. Gallo.

Fun Fact: I am a triplet (2 brothers) and have an older brother.

From this class, I would like to learn about important data sources that will help me obtain more information and be able to know what to do with that information.

Miles Sandbothe, Saint Louis

I am a senior here at Mizzou and I would like to be a marketing consultant at the end of my program.

I have 3 dogs and a pet rabbit.

One thing I hope to learn from this class is how to do better more accurate market data research with accurate sources.

My name is Megan Rice and I am from St. Louis. 

I am a senior and I would like to be a marketing coordinator. 

An awesome experience I have is studying abroad in Italy for 3 months. 

I would like to learn about interpreting data and making decisions based off the data.

My name is Alex Bass and I'm from Aurora, Illinois.

I am a senior and after graduation, I want to get into marketing research. 

A hobby that I have is soccer. 

I want to learn about some major changes that happen to market research as different types of technology advancements are made.

My name is Manuel Escobar and I'm from Colombia.

I'm a Senior (fifth-year senior next year), and I would like to be a digital marketer or a data analyst.

An interesting fact is that I speak Spanish.

As simple as it sounds, I don't know the answer to it. I want to know how Marketing Research impacts Marketing Analytics or a Data Analyst

My name is Tamara Stanojevic and I am from Saint Louis, MO.

I am currently a Senior and hope to work in Social Media Marketing upon graduation. 

A fun fact about me is that I have visited more countries than U.S. states. 

Through this course, I would like to learn more about data collection methods/software and how to effectively utilize them.

My name is Mercedes Moravec and I am from STL, Missouri. 

I am a senior graduating in May. After graduation, I plan to go into sales. 

I love to travel and read. When I graduate, I am moving to Scottsdale, AZ!

As I have accepted a full-time job offer, I would like to learn how marketing research can be applied to my future career in sales.

What is your name? My name is Lacy Thompson and I am from Atlanta, Georgia

What is your quest? My quest is to live a successful and happy life thriving in the tech world. I am a senior and will be joining a cybersecurity firm come graduation working in sales

What is your favorite color? My favorite color is beige and white. An interesting fact is I just got back to the USA after studying abroad in Spain for 6 months. 

What is the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow? no clue but Python works great. I would like to be able to answer the question of why marketing research will benefit me in my career as well as why I am required to take this course! I think marketing research is going to be very interesting and I also enjoy solving problems and hope that this course has a taste of that!
